Message:
We took one look
at each other before
charging towards
the evil sword.

The holy radiance
of our blade tears
the ominous power
asunder.

its ominous glow vanished
as if being pulled into
the heavens.

We did it.
We destroyed the sword.

As I sighed in relief,
Artie threw her arms
around me from behind.

With tears
welling in her eyes,
she said to me...

“Thank you, Richesse.
And, I’m sorry for
dragging you into this.”

It looks like she doesn’t
quite get it yet.

“There’s no way I wasn’t
gonna help you.

We’re partners after all.
We share sins, pain—
everything.”

“I’ll help you carry
the burdens that are
too heavy for you to
carry alone.”

“That’s why,
if there’s ever a time
I’m in trouble,

you better be sure to
help me too, okay partner?
Hehe.”
